member.name: P:Blazorise.Components.Autocomplete`2.ConfirmKey
member.summary:
Gets or sets an array of the keyboard pressed values for the ConfirmKey. If this is null or empty, there will be no confirmation key.
Defauls to: { "Enter", "NumpadEnter", "Tab" }.
member.remarks: If the value has a printed representation, this attribute's value is the same as the char attribute. Otherwise, it's one of the key value strings specified in 'Key values'.
